img_below_text:
Baw-Lang-Lang can be found at the start of the Bishui Cave but not technically in it. Once you've completed the five cart questline and smashed through the frozen door of the Bishui Cave, you'll want to head inside and down to the left to find another of the frog bosses.
Baw-Lang-Lang

img_summary: The image depicts "Baw-Lang-Lang," a frog-like boss character from a video game. It is located near the entrance of Bishui Cave, outside the cave itself. The preceding and following text describes its role as a boss encountered after completing a questline involving five carts and breaking through a frozen door.
